The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 December is 1,584,292 (2,814.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 December, there were 93,625 new confirmed cases (166.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 December, there were 84,986 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% (8,639 extra cases).
